subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: María José Martínez Sánchez beat Melanie Oudin of the United States, 6-4, 6-4, to give Spain a 1-0 lead in the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.
snippet: María José Martínez Sánchez beat Melanie Oudin of the United States, 6-4, 6-4, to give Spain a 1-0 lead in the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.
